file_content.text: ...And finally, strange reports from soldiers stationed on the remote and battle-torn planet of Ilum.
A mysterious starship of unknown design has apparently touched down at the outskirts of the battle zone. Official sources have refused to comment.
Greetings, Red Rhombus! The Gree Enclave extends orange parallel to you with this unidirectional transmission message.
Greetings, Black Bisector! The Gree Enclave extends orange parallel to you with this unidirectional transmission message.
Greetings, honored biped! The Gree Enclave extends orange parallel to you with this unidirectional transmission message.
Elation progresses throughout the Enclave: Gray Secant, an ancient starship crafted by revered Gree ancestors, has reappeared from its multi-millennial task of exploration!
Gray Secant has chosen the world you call Ilum for its next site of analysis. The intricacies of your culture's warfare dominate its interest.
The Enclave deems you essential for analysis by Gray Secant. Join us on Ilum! Demonstrate combativeness for Gray Secant, and Gree technologies will be given in return!
